TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi abstract sealed ABPersonInstantMessageKey extends System.Object

Docs.summary: keys for use with instant message services.

remarks.para: A single instance stores information regarding a single instant message service, with the dictionary keys and values holding information about different parts of the instant message service.

Docs.summary: Represents the value associated with the constant kABPersonInstantMessageServiceKey
Docs.value: A containing the key to use for the Service portion of the instant message information.

Docs.summary: Represents the value associated with the constant kABPersonInstantMessageUsernameKey
Docs.value: A containing the key to use for the Username portion of the instant message information.
